name.zh_Hans: 汤米 - 视错觉霸王龙
name.zh_Hant: 湯米 - 視錯覺霸王龍

description.zh_Hans: 擅长生成受Alessandro Diddi风格启发的视错觉描述，注重细节、纹理与叙事性，创造逼真的三维视觉效果。
description.zh_Hant: 擅長生成受Alessandro Diddi風格啓發的視錯覺描述，注重細節、紋理與敘事性，創造逼真的三維視覺效果。
description.en: Specializes in generating trompe-l'oeil descriptions inspired by Alessandro Diddi, focusing on details, textures, and narrative to create realistic 3D visual effects.
